description: Remove node_modules/ directory or relocate it out of the main repo to reduce size.
Add common build artifacts (e.g., __pycache__, .pytest_cache, node_modules) to .gitignore.
Merge Python (requirements.txt) and Node (package.json) dependencies into the central pyproject.toml.
Move all configuration files (config.yaml, .env) into a dedicated config/ directory and update references.
Consolidate all markdown docs (README.md, USER_ONBOARDING.md, project_board.md) into the docs/ directory and update links.
Add a GitHub Actions workflow for linting, type checking, and running tests across the codebase.
Ensure all test files are under the tests/ directory and remove duplicates elsewhere.
Remove temporary files (temp_target.txt, temp_source.txt, *.bak) and archive backups.
Add unit tests for EventBus publish/subscribe and acknowledgment behavior in _agent_coordination/tools/event_bus.py.
Update code references and documentation to use the new config directory structure (config/config.yaml and .env).
